SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.login

Class OscarRequestTokenService

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.login.OscarRequestTokenService
@Component @Path("/initiate") public class OscarRequestTokenService extends Object
OAuth 1.0a Request Token Service using ScribeJava. This REST service issues temporary request tokens to clients which will be later authorized and exchanged for access tokens. It replaces the CXF-based OAuth implementation with ScribeJava.

    • getRequestToken

      @POST @Produces("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getRequestToken(@Context javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, @Context javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Handles POST requests for OAuth 1.0a request tokens. This method implements the OAuth 1.0a request token endpoint as specified in RFC 5849. It validates the consumer key, generates a temporary request token, stores it, and returns it to the client in form-encoded format.
      Parameters:
      request - HTTP servlet request
      response - HTTP servlet response
      Returns:
      Response containing the request token or error
